meanings.definition: Fossilized footprints or tracks left by animals.
meanings.sent1: The ichnites in the mud showed where the dinosaurs had walked.
meanings.sent2: Scientists found ichnites of ancient creatures preserved in the rock.
meanings.sent3: The ichnites in the sand looked like a trail of tiny dinosaur footprints.
meanings.sent4: The ichnites of the past echoed the footsteps of long-gone animals.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of ichnites helped researchers learn about prehistoric life.

meanings.definition: The study or science of fossilized footprints.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to the study of ichnites and their significance.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on the science of ichnites.
meanings.sent3: In the world of ichnites, every footprint tells a story.
meanings.sent4: The ichnites revealed secrets of ancient ecosystems to the researchers.
meanings.sent5: His passion for ichnites led him to become a renowned paleontologist.
